title: List of radio stations in Illinois
text: The following is a list of <a href="Federal%20Communications%20Commission">FCC</a>-licensed <a href="radio%20stations">radio stations</a> in the U.S. state of <a href="Illinois">Illinois</a>, which can be sorted by their <a href="Call%20signs%20in%20North%20America">call signs</a>, <a href="frequency">frequencies</a>, <a href="city%20of%20license">cities of license</a>, licensees, and <a href="radio%20format">programming formats</a>.
